TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_users
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for User-Content for the LBPLANNER App

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID assigned from moodle.

FIELD.NAME: theme
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the theme the user has selected in the app.

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: Language the user has selected in the app.

FIELD.NAME: colorblindness
FIELD.COMMENT: The colorblindness the user has selected in the app.

FIELD.NAME: displaytaskcount
FIELD.COMMENT: The display task count the user has selected in the app.

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_courses
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Course-Content for the LBPLANNER App

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID assigned from moodle.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user for whom this course's settings are for.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: The short name for this course the user has chosen.

FIELD.NAME: color
FIELD.COMMENT: The color of the course the user wants to display the in in the UI.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the user has enabled (1) the course for planning or not (0).

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_notification
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Notifications for the LBPLANNER App

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user for whom this notification is for.

FIELD.NAME: info
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional information about the notification

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the notification has been read or not.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of event that triggered the notifcation.

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when the notification was created.

FIELD.NAME: timestamp_read
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when the notification was read.

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_plan_invites
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Invites for the LBPLANNER Appme

FIELD.NAME: planid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the plan the user is inviting to.

FIELD.NAME: inviteeid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user being invited.

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the invitee was invited.

FIELD.NAME: inviterid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user who sent the invite.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the invite. {0: Pending, 1: Accepted, 2: Declined}

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_plans
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Plans for the LBPLANNER App

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_plan_access
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Access for the plans for the LBPLANNER App

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_deadlines
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Deadlines for the LBPLANNER App

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_feedback
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for Feedback for the LBPLANNER App

FIELD.NAME: startunit
FIELD.COMMENT: The school unit this slot starts in (8:00 is unit 1)

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: The duration of the slot in school units

FIELD.NAME: weekday
FIELD.COMMENT: The day of the week, starting with monday at 1

FIELD.NAME: room
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the associated room

FIELD.NAME: size
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount of students that can fitin this slot

FIELD.NAME: slotid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the slot this reservation belongs to

FIELD.NAME: date
FIELD.COMMENT: The date this reservation is taking place on

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user which has got this slot reserved

FIELD.NAME: reserverid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user which reserved this slot

TABLE.NAME: local_lbplanner_slot_courses
TABLE.COMMENT: Courses and classes that slots belong to

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course associated with this slot or NULL if any

FIELD.NAME: vintage
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the associated class or NULL if any
